name: SenshiKing
description:
SenshiKing is a local multiplayer turn-based game with rock-paper-scissors mechanics, inspired by Mesuking and Mushiking: The King of Beetles.

The players can choose one from various fighters and use different power-ups during the battle. In addition, the players can perform all these actions by presenting and placing other markers in the arena field. The game environment mimics the day/night light and the weather conditions that dwell in real-life.

In the end, only the toughest luckier survives.

Instructions to Play

Two people must play SenshiKing on the same mobile device. 

The game should start with the players positioning of the arena. Then, each player needs to choose a character by showing its marker to the camera. After that, each player has a turn to select a symbol (rock, paper, or scissors) with the designated markers. 

Sometimes the game generates power-ups, visible above the characters' health bars. There is a marker for the power-ups (the one with the red box), and there are three power-ups: cloud, meteor, and arrow. Each one has different uses, and they can be explored to deal more damage to the opponent or recover health.
